text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Over the past three weeks, Trump has spoken for 13 hours at coronavirus pressers. In that time he has spent just 4.5 min offering sympathy for the victims. Out of 2340 minutes - 4.5 minutes!

Far too busy campaigning. Praising himself and lashing out at Democrats and journalists.
